title: What are some piano practice techniques used by Lang Lang? - Quora

response.answer_text: Practice is a private and solitary occupation. Learning to practice effectively happens over years with guidance from teachers. Only Lang Lang can tell you his techniques. He may have been interviewed about his techniques but I am unaware of any articles about the topic.
Do you mean ling ling? Trills, scales, etc… study a lot of music theory, and practice 40 hours a day
